filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e03 Mission Creep-3.mp4
title: Mission Creep
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E03 - Mission Creep.mp4
description: The latest number is an ex-soldier who's now part of a gang that specialize in robberies. Mr. Reese goes undercover, infiltrating the gang. This triggers memories of Jessica.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e06 The Fix-6.mp4
title: The Fix
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E06 - The Fix.mp4
description: Mr. Reese goes as the new driver of fixer Zoe Morgan in order to decide if she's a victim or perpetrator. When Zoe listens to a recording she isn't supposed to, she becomes the target of a pharmaceutical company.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e09 Get Carter-9.mp4
title: Get Carter
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E09 - Get Carter.mp4
description: Reese and Finch's game of cat and mouse with Detective Carter becomes infinitely more complicated when The Machine declares that she is their newest POI.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e10 Number Crunch-10.mp4
title: Number Crunch
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E10 - Number Crunch.mp4
description: As Detective Carter deals with the fallout from her recent encounter with Reese and Finch, The Machine ups the ante for the duo by giving them four Social Security numbers instead of one.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e13 Root Cause-13.mp4
title: Root Cause
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E13 - Root Cause.mp4
description: Finch and Reese run surveillance on a man who's been unemployed for eight months without his family knowing. Angry that he's been fired, he may pose a threat to society.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e15 Blue Code-15.mp4
title: Blue Code
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E15 - Blue Code.mp4
description: Reese discovers there's more to the story after he infiltrates a smuggling ring to get close to his latest POI.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e17 Baby Blue-17.mp4
title: Baby Blue
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E17 - Baby Blue.mp4
description: When Moretti gets released from prison, Carter and Mr. Reese team up to protect him from Elias. Meanwhile, Finch's new number belongs to a six month old baby girl.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e18 Identity Crisis-18.mp4
title: Identity Crisis
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E18 - Identity Crisis.mp4
description: Finch and Mr. Reese are going after a person who seems to be leading a double life. However, they soon realize there are 2 people with the same social security number; one of whom is in danger and one who's an impostor.

filename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/Person Of Interest S01e20 Matsya Nyaya-20.mp4
title: Matsya Nyaya
newFilename: D:/TV Shows/Person of Interest (2011)/season1/E20 - Matsya Nyaya.mp4
description: In 2012, Mr. Reese goes undercover as an armored car security guard to prevent a robbery. In 2010, CIA plan to eliminate two of their best agents.
